game.name: Moto X3M Pool Party
game.description:
Moto X3M 5 Pool Party is a fifth sequel to the popular Moto X3M series featuring three biker options, 22 amazing levels and a fantastic stunt bike. Race, brake and flip your motorbike through multiple pools and beaches and explore all new power-ups and bike models.

Key Features:

  • 22 Exciting and Challenging Levels: Immerse yourself in a variety of addictive and challenging levels that will test your biking abilities. Make sure to jump perfectlty and conquer each course to achieve the coveted three-star rating.
  • Diverse Obstacles and Stunning Environments: Experience thrilling rides through diverse landscapes, from bustling city areas to mysterious caves and breath-taking beaches. Navigate treacherous terrains and conquer various obstacles that lie in your path. Land your jumps with precision to maintain momentum and avoid terrible crashes.
  • Unlockable Bikes and Riders: Progress through the game by completing levels and unlock a range of cool bikes and riders. Customize your biking experience by selecting the bike that complements your style and preferences.

You will find sunshine, waterslides, giant tubes, and umbrellas along the way. Tilt your bike strategically to maintain balance, steer clear of crashes, and master your jumps to earn a perfect three-star rating in every level.

Your objective is to complete each task at blazing speed and secure all three stars to prove yourself as the ultimate bike racing champion. Moto X3M 5 Bike Race combines captivating level designs, fabulous gameplay, and intuitive controls, providing an unmatched motorcycle driving experience that will leave you thrilled for more.
